thread.title: American’s new 737 MAX won't have seatback screens

author: Special for USA TODAY
title: American’s new 737 MAX won't have seatback screens
text: Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email American’s new 737 MAX won't have seatback screens passengers will be able to stream airline-provided content on their own devices. Post to Facebook American’s new 737 MAX won't have seatback screens passengers will be able to stream airline-provided content on their own devices. Jeremy Dwyer-Lindgren, Special for USA TODAY A welcome sign for Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport. DFW was American's busiest hub (by passengers) in 2015. PR NEWSWIRE The skyline of Charlotte. The Charlotte airport was American's second-busiest hub (by passengers) in 2015. Chuck Burton, AP A child walks through the airport in Miami. Miami International was American's third-busiest hub (by passengers) in 2015. J Pat Carter, AP The skyline of Chicago. Chicago's O'Hare airport was American's fourth-busiest hub (by passengers) in 2015. Kiichiro Sato, AP The skyline of Philadelphia. Philadelphia International Airport was American's fifth-busiest hub (by passengers) in 2015. Bruce Bennett, Getty Images The skyline of Phoenix. The city's Sky Harbor International Airport was American's xixth-busiest hub (by passengers) in 2015. phlens/iStockphoto, Getty Images A welcome sign for Los Angeles International Airport. LAX was American's seventh busiest hub (by passengers) in 2015. Reed Saxon, AP Fullscreen The skyline of New York. American counts its operations operations at JFK and LaGuardia airports as a combined hub, though the airports are separated by a considerable cab ride during normal traffic conditions.LaGuardia was American's eighth-busiest hub (by passengers) in 2015. JFK was ninth. Mark Lennihan, AP An American Airlines flight flies over the National Mall in Washington, D.C. The Washington Reagan National Airport was American's 10th busiest hub in 2015. Ben Mutzabaugh, USA TODAY Like this topic? You may also like these photo galleries: Replay
